post.body: well @tyr nominated me for #wwgwd and who is going to compete with that? Well, actually probably @aaronwheeler will try.
there is NO competition for @ines and the #mojito. None.
love the line "These days I tend to accumulate domain names like I do shoes". Yes, me too. It's addicting.
no flamenco in NYC, it's all about the chorusline
no!! sadly, I only drank part of it! It was delightfully yummy though and it makes me want to dance the flamenco .
you are so sweet!! Thanks for the nomination!
http://www.bravenewcode.com/wptouch/
I am not really going to feel sorry for you for the long flight when you just spent almost a week in paris!
me too!! Perhaps I should turn my house into an ice bar for the small soiree I am hosting for office peeps later today.
nope! In tough economic times, gingerknows how to be creative ;) #wwgwd
A little innocuous post i wrote about a local charity, yields BIG holiday gift to said charity by one of my clients. (BIG!)
trigger finger. thank god, i don't eat fruitcake.
and don't forget the weenie blog, for those days when you just want to say.... bite me :)
I needed this today, maybe you do too! Rainbows & chicken soup for you! http://blip.fm/~16278
As frightening as it sounds, that IS actually affordable.
definitely! & with that thought, this girl needs to head to dreamland. bon soir mon amis!
zero degrees? ouch. I know a good agent in California when you are ready to move.
no coffee for me thank you, but I do have some bills that you are welcome to pay :)
good point! NO!
why a single married name? Can't people be married but still have separate identities? I think that is the key to success.
I just had this sudden urge to sign up for twitter with my previous name
women should not change names. Like building an identity and throwing it away. Sometimes u want to go back but it's too late.
why don't you send it to him in japanese?
maybe it is just my eyesite then.
I think @PropertyQwest has a low threshold if THAT brief convo killed him :) We could do so much worse.
curiosity killed the cat?
no wonder I am so bad at karaoke!
that is odd. I wonder when I quit you. :) Following again.
I adore my fam, it will be a blast, but actually hosting is LOT of work! Especially for a perfectionist party planner!
I wrote an Agent Genius post about that. I call it "Twitter Block" Others may call is lurking.
I have a passion for philanthropy, love it
i volunteer with junior league. We have big initiative called "kids in the kitchen", fighting childhood obesity, possible tie in?
that is a great thing! Who do you volunteer your time with?
i have a bunch of sites, 1 install per! host is blue host, I did manual installs. Most smooth, but just lot of them & other chgs
W.P. can be tempermental but he comes w/ instructions. After 7 installs, we r going steady. .until newer "model" comes out. ;)
that is pretty unforgiveable that @tcar did that, serious faux pas
@hellasound not ignoring your wwgwd# request, it just requires a carefully crafted response. no crocs is a great start however.
that is really not fair. How can @respres @jeffx @andykaufman @tcar @jonwashburn and others participate in big hair wednesday?
@jenmyronuk and i want to plan 80s @techkaraokesf night, I will bring out the super big hair then
oh, i think i could compete in a hair contest. i can do BIG 80s hair. Texas big. Dallas big.
i retract my flock of seagulls statement. you are so mclovin that I would still sit next to you, seagull flocking and all. ;)
as long as you don't show up on my flight with Flock of seagulls hair style, we are good. If u do, @morganb can sit next to you
Off to the pac union holiday party!
WHO-HOOO. Owner of extra large u-haul parked in front of my house last 24 hours has finally moved the truck, just in time for my soiree!!
RT @ResPres: RT @tcar: Guess what me favorite social network is. http://snurl.com/7sm42 (All in favor or #IRL hashtag say "aye.")
Caterer tasting was AWESOME. I didn't get to taste the sangria, but they did have me try a spanish inspired martini-the raging bull. yum!
off to go do tastings today with caterer in prep for my "Sevilla" gala in May. I wonder if I get to taste the sangria too?
Blogworld & New Media Expo set for Oct 15-17 in Las Vegas. Calendar noted.
42 degrees inside my house. yes, inside. hmmm. perhaps a little heater problem.
bad thing about facebook for fashionistas- people might have already seen that hot outfit even if they weren't with you. toooo many pics.
there is something immensely satisfying about bankrupting the feed reader. I wonder if killing the inbox would feel the same way......
In life we donâ€™t get what we want, we get in life what we are. If we want more we have to be able to be more- farrah gray
working on finances at 1:15 in the morning is a bad idea.
http://twitpic.com/t10v - Why am I paying for cable?
2 days before Xmas and I can't hunt down chocolate in my office. What kind of place are they running here?
I am not sure how my family talked me into agreeing to allow ALL of them to come for christmas. sucker.
For Xmas, I am going to give my mom SEO. Seriously. Went to her website and about died when I saw all the simple fixes I could do.
i have to tell 7 facts about me for a meme. Have a pressing question? Send me a DM and help me write my meme!
oh fudge. @stevebelt memed me. don't you already know everything about me?
my 3000th tweet was so anti-climatic after my faux 3000th tweet last week
